name: Shoot Them Deeper
description:
Goal

This is a shoot them up game where you need to count how many enemies you killed or saw not to lose a life when the doors appear. If your answer is valid, you’ll get a free bonus.

There is no end, the goal is just to do the best score and go the deepest possible. You win points by killing enemies and by going to next levels.

Context

Game done for the 48th edition of the ludum dare game jam.

Controls

Keyboard: Arrows or asdw to move. Space to shoot.

Controller: Left stick do move. Any button to shoot.

R: Reset

M: Mute

You can play with your friends, they just have to join by pressing Space or Start.

Authors

Florian Dufour

Matthieu Saül

Voices

Quentin Calabrese
